sentence.Network_en: Enchant Bracer - Major Defense : Permanently enchants bracers to increase your defense by 8.
sentence.Network_cn: 使一副护腕永久的获得防御技能+8的效果.

sentence.Network_en: Enchant Bracer - Stats : Permanently enchants bracers to increase all stats by 4.
sentence.Network_cn: 使一副护腕永久的获得+4所有属性的效果.

sentence.Network_en: Enchant Bracer - Brawn : Permanently enchants bracers to increase Strength by 12.
sentence.Network_cn: 使一副 护腕 永久的获得+12力量的效果.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French braciere, from bras 'arm' (see bracelet)

means.word_mean: 1. a protective covering for the wrist or arm that is used in archery and fencing and other sports
2. a tonic or restorative (especially a drink of liquor)
